column2: Role & responsibilities                    This is a full-time on-site role for a 3D Designer at Sri Ganesh Jewellery & Gem Corner located in Ariyakudi, Karaikkudi. The 3D Designer will be responsible for day-to-day tasks associated with Sculpture and Indian God statue 3d for creating high-quality jewelry designs.  Preferred candidate profile     3D Design, Animation, and 3D Modeling skills Lighting and Graphic Design skills Experience in Jewelry design is preferred Proficiency in 3D design software including Zbrush Ability to interpret design briefs and translate them into 3D renderings Fluent speaks in Tamil, English

column2: Job Description and KRA:       We are looking for someone who can understand paper designs and their linking and design the CAD accordingly     The current vacancy is for a full-time cad technician who can use Rhino/Matrix to a high level. Our work involves mass pave layout and techniques laying gems on organic surfaces from Zbrush/ T-Splines. The person will be responsible for making jewellery design and 360 videos.       Skills needed:       Rhino = compulsory     Matrix = Preferred     Zbrush = Higher pay scale depending on level     Tspline = Higher pay scale depending on Level     Keyshot Rendering = Higher pay scale       Long term loyalty :       We have Long term Loyalty schemes that would ensure rises in Payscale and other bonuses all will be discussed in the interview process       offers.

column2: Role & responsibilities  :  Proficiency in Matrix/Rhino CAD software.   Transform technical drawings of manual designs into 3D models meeting specified parameters.   Generate precise CAD designs with optimal daily output.   Interpret customer requirements from the Product Development team and create  sketches within specified timeframes.   Develop designs with detailed breakdowns and technical specifications for  presentations.   Research and analyze local market trends to create designs aligned with market demands.   Evaluate final products to ensure they adhere to design specifications.  Skills :  Proficiency in CAD software such as Rhinoceros 3D, Gemvision Matrix.   Should be well versed with the complete CAD process.   Working knowledge of Z-Brush would be preferred.   Design Specifications and defining requirements  Requirements : ??Work experience of 2-5 years in the jewellery industry  ??Education qualification: Diploma or any bachelors degree  ??Adaptability and ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.  ??Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
